posts.title: Cardboard Paper Skull
posts.content: Examine the intricacies of the most important human body part by accentuating your room or office with the cardboard paper skull. This easy to assemble skull is made from recycled cardboard and portrays a detailed image of the human skull in all its glory.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Aquarium
posts.content: Breathe new life into your fishy friend’s abode by upgrading their pad to the glow in the dark aquarium. With this unique kit you’ll be able to decorate your aquarium with specialized props that glow bright when placed under a black light.

posts.title: Purple Galaxy Bed Covers
posts.content: Go on an out of this world mission to dreamland by sleeping in the purple galaxy bed covers. These lovely satin covers showcase a mesmerizing image of our vast cosmos with amazing detail and artistry that will captivate your imagination.

posts.title: Rotating Laser Cat Toy
posts.content: Effortlessly keep your feline friend entertained with this rotating laser cat toy. It features convenient hands-free operation and comes fitted with two safe-play low-output lasers that spin so that your kitty can play simultaneously with a friend.

posts.title: Orthopedic Mattress Pet Bed
posts.content: Give old Rex the comfort he deserves by having him rest on top of this orthopedic mattress pet bed. This cozy 27″ x 36″ bed helps soothe pressure point for a more restful sleep and it comes with a soft machine washable cover with a water resistant base.

posts.title: Hand Bra Shirt
posts.content: Turn heads wherever you go with the hand bra shirt. The shirt’s eye catching design creates the illusion that the only thing standing between your boobies and the world is a pair of strategically placed hands. Truly a great way to show off your bod without actually doing so.

posts.title: Pizza Slice Beanbag Chair
posts.content: The world’s best tasting food and most comfortable type of chair have joined forces to bring you the pizza slice beanbag chair. This unique chair tantalizes taste buds with its greasy and savory graphics while the triangular slice shape provides ultimate comfort.

posts.title: Soylent Flavored Ready To Drink Food
posts.content: Enjoying a nutritional meal on-the-go has never been easier ever thanks to Soylent. Each vegan-friendly flavorful pouch comes filled with a delicious nectar full of nutrients and vitamins that account for 20% of your daily nutritional requirements.

posts.title: Cookie Shot Glass Making Pan Set
posts.content: Take your snacking to the next level by improving a classic with this cookie shot glass making pan set. This nonstick dishwasher safe pan comes with six cylindrical cavities that let you create perfectly shaped cookie shot glasses that are ideal for filling with milk.

posts.title: Tactical Vest Beer Koozie
posts.content: Protect your icy beverage from heating up too fast when you’re holding it by placing it inside this tactical vest beer koozie. This heavy duty koozie features a military inspired design made to look like a small tactical vest -complete with adjustable shoulder straps.

posts.title: Sriracha Seasoning Sticks
posts.content: Give any dish a spicy kick using one of these sriracha seasoning sticks. Simply impale the sticks into your meats and they will slowly begin to liquefy as you cook, allowing your meats to absorb the flavor from the inside out.

posts.title: Push Botton 1950s Black Payphone
posts.content: Give your home some retro charm by swapping your cordless model for this push button 1950s black payphone. It features a neat vintage design complete with an integrated coin slot, yet comes equipped with modern features like push buttons and volume control.
